column4: Hey. My dad—a complete Windows n00b—say wants to learn Linux. Do you guys have any good guides tailored specifically for people like him? I know in the past Ubuntu was Windows-user friendly, not sure how much it is now, with Unity and all....
well, 10 years ago he actually condemned Linux and told me that no one in the world would ever write good software for free. I wonder what changed his mind lol :)
